page.title: 16Planning and Development
page.content: Few new houses have been built in or around the area of Kynnersley in recent years.Local planning restrictions dictate that there must be a social need for any new housing built.This area is not designated for any significant residential or industrial growth. Permission for developing the derelict farm yard of Crown farm into a small residential estate has been refused by local planners partly on the grounds that there is no main sewer disposal. As houses have to use septic tanks for sewage further development would cause greater problems for farmers as the water table in this area is already high. Of the local residences 65% are owner occupied 17.5% local authority 15% private landlord/tied cottage and 2.5& private landlord.
